# Valid Citations Fixture

This file contains valid citations that should all pass verification.

## Citation 1: Valid Book

```yaml
id: Valid-Book-2020
type: book
authors:
  - Smith, John
  - Doe, Jane
title: "A Valid Book Title"
year: 2020
publisher: Academic Press
location: New York, NY
isbn: 978-0-13-468599-1
url: https://www.example.com/valid-book
verified: true
verification_url: https://scholar.google.com/example
notes: "A properly formatted book citation"
```

## Citation 2: Valid Article

```yaml
id: Valid-Article-2023
type: article
authors:
  - Johnson, Alice
  - Williams, Bob
title: "A Valid Journal Article"
journal: "Journal of Validation Studies"
year: 2023
volume: 45
issue: 3
pages: "123-145"
doi: "10.1234/jvs.2023.0042"
url: https://doi.org/10.1234/jvs.2023.0042
verified: true
verification_url: https://www.example.com/article
notes: "A properly formatted article citation"
```

## Citation 3: Valid Standard

```yaml
id: Valid-Standard-2022
type: standard
authors:
  - International Standards Organization
title: "Standard for Testing"
year: 2022
standard_number: ISO 12345:2022
publisher: ISO
url: https://www.iso.org/standard/12345.html
verified: true
verification_url: https://www.iso.org/standard/12345.html
notes: "A properly formatted standard citation"
```

## Citation 4: Valid Report

```yaml
id: Valid-Report-2024
type: report
authors:
  - Research Institute
title: "Annual Research Report"
year: 2024
publisher: Research Institute
url: https://www.research-institute.org/report-2024.pdf
verified: true
verification_url: https://www.research-institute.org/report-2024.pdf
notes: "A properly formatted report citation"
```

## Citation 5: Valid arXiv Preprint

```yaml
id: Valid-Arxiv-2024
type: article
authors:
  - Researcher, First
title: "A Preprint on arXiv"
year: 2024
arxiv: "2401.12345"
url: https://arxiv.org/abs/2401.12345
verified: true
verification_url: https://arxiv.org/abs/2401.12345
notes: "Valid arXiv preprint - no journal/DOI required"
```
